data: The thread "Project Alpha Status Update" discusses the completion of UI design and the start of integration testing for Project Alpha.
The thread "Project Alpha Status Update" communicates that API endpoints for Project Alpha have been defined and documented.
The thread "Project Alpha Status Update" outlines next steps including performance testing and scheduling a user acceptance criteria review for Project Alpha.
The thread "Project Alpha Status Update" indicates that integration testing is progressing well with no major issues and that first results are expected by Thursday.
The thread "Project Alpha Status Update" instructs thorough documentation of all test cases and scheduling of a user acceptance testing session by early next week.
